A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.
I made this 700 Mb rip for those of you who want the subtitles and cannot handle the full 4.5 Giga. Or those who just want a good 700 Mb rip. Thanks to 'dong1974' for uploading the DVD.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
